alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Millard County through 515 PM MDT... At 446 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Kanosh, or 19 miles southwest of Fillmore, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Millard County. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 143 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
